channel.title: Is this code right? (tried to take ::noclip off)

item.title: Is this code right? (tried to take ::noclip off)
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“kidzcoder, post:22, topic:268039”]wouldn’t this work?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights >=3) }else{ if playerRights >=0) sendMessage("No! You are not an Admin!"); } [/quote]
No. That makes absolutely no sense.
Anyways, his problem has been solved, so let’s just stop posting in this topic.

Read full topic
item.source: Is this code right? (tried to take ::noclip off)

item.title: Is this code right? (tried to take ::noclip off)
item.dc:creator: @kidzcoder kidzcoder
item.description:
@kidzcoder wrote:

wouldn’t this work?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights >=3)
}else{
if playerRights >=0)
sendMessage("No! You are not an Admin!"); 
}

item.title: Is this code right? (tried to take ::noclip off)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

There is no point of banning a player just for trying to use noclip. When the player knows that there will be a disconnection once the command is activated, the command won’t be used anymore.

Read full topic
